com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.scheduler

Interface ScheduledTask


  • public interface ScheduledTask
    A task scheduled within the Scheduler service
    Author:
    Jaroslav Bachorik

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String INTERVAL_PROPERTY
      Property-change support

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Quantum getInterval()
      The interval the task is scheduled to run at
      boolean isSuspended()
      Indicates the suspension status of the task
      void resume()
      Resumes a previously suspended task
      void setInterval(Quantum quantum)
      Modifies the interval the task is scheduled to run at
      void suspend()
      Suspends the task A shortcut to calling setInterval(Quantum.SUSPENDED)

      • INTERVAL_PROPERTY

        static final String INTERVAL_PROPERTY
        Property-change support

    • Method Detail

      • setInterval

        void setInterval(Quantum quantum)
        Modifies the interval the task is scheduled to run at
        Parameters:
        quantum - The new interval

      • getInterval

        Quantum getInterval()
        The interval the task is scheduled to run at
        Returns:
        Returns the number of seconds between two runs

      • suspend

        void suspend()
        Suspends the task A shortcut to calling setInterval(Quantum.SUSPENDED)

      • resume

        void resume()
        Resumes a previously suspended task

      • isSuspended

        boolean isSuspended()
        Indicates the suspension status of the task
        Returns:
        Returns the suspension status of the task
